name: tm41
effect: Teaches Torment to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Torment to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: ThunderPunch Gen I: Softboiled)

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.
